data.name: Get-ADSyncAADPasswordResetConfiguration
Get-ADSyncAutoUpgrade
data.value: $state = Get-ADSyncAutoUpgrade -Detail $props = $state | GM | ? MemberType -like "Property" $result = New-Object PSObject $props | foreach { $val = $state.($_.Name) $result | Add-Member -MemberType NoteProperty -Name ($_.Name) -Value ([string]$val) } $result

data.name: Get-ADSyncConnectorsBasic
data.comment: Semi-reduced output from Get-ADSyncConnector. Full output has too much nested data and is 100+ MB when there are many connectors.

data.name: Get-AdSyncGlobalSettingsStrict
Start-ADSyncDelta
